name: SwiftFormat
description: Runs SwiftFormat when Swift files are saved.

config.title: Run formatter when a Swift document is saved
Swift Version
config.description: The Swift version to be passed to swiftformat. If your project includes a `.swift-version` file, the version in that file will be used instead. If this is not set at all, certain formatter rules will not run.

config.title: Path
config.description: A full path to a `swiftformat` executable. The extension will use a built-in `swiftformat` if this is left empty.   This setting can be used to ensure that all members of a team use the same particular version.

configWorkspace.title: Swift Version
configWorkspace.description: The Swift version to be passed to swiftformat. If your project includes a `.swift-version` file, the version set in the file will be used instead.

configWorkspace.title: Path
configWorkspace.description: A full path to a `swiftformat` executable. The extension will use a built-in `swiftformat` if this is left empty. This setting can be used to ensure that all members of a team use the same particular version.
